name: Black & Rust Orange Floral Print Tiered Midi Fit & Flare Dress with Ruffles
reviews: I purchased this dress after reading a lot of good reviews. Fabric is feather light, print is nice, it's sleeve and neck design are good. But in the product I received, there were lot of extra thread stitching faults. Finishing was not upto the standard. There were fabric ends unstitched and unfinished. Because it's dark color it's not prominently visible but for the price paid I would say the finishing of the product was poor. So overall design was good but finishing was poor for the price. I have purchased better quality dresses on Myntra at lower prices. So this review is in comparison with those and the prices. Dress looks nice when you were and click pictures and flaws are not visible. But if you are like me particular about those small details then I don't recommend buying this one. | A knee length dress with ruffle and tiers puffed sleeves a v-neck.material quality is good too ü§©

reviews: This is my second time ordering from Myntra, and while I was disappointed to find the plastic cover torn, making me question the authenticity at first, the jeans turned out to be genuine. However, the damaged packaging still left me a bit skeptical. On the bright side, the delivery was on time, and I received the correct size. The color and stitching were exactly on point, just as advertised, which was a relief. I really hope Myntra improves the packaging part, but overall, I‚Äôm happy with the product quality. | These jeans offer a perfect balance of comfort and style. The slim yet relaxed fit enhances the overall silhouette without feeling too tight. The medium-wash denim gives it a classic and versatile appeal, making it easy to pair with both casual and semi-formal outfits. The fabric appears durable yet flexible, ensuring all-day comfort. The minimal detailing keeps the design sleek and timeless. Whether styled with a casual plaid shirt or a crisp white tee, these jeans elevate the look effortlessly. Ideal for everyday wear, they provide a stylish edge while maintaining a comfortable, easygoing vibe. A must-have wardrobe staple!
